settings.name: Data Attribute
settings.description: Insert the name of your selected attribute in the exact spelling as provided in your data set. If unsure, please run the App preceding this one in your workflow and check the Track Attributes in the Output Details overview.

settings.name: Selection Relation
settings.description: Choose how you want to filter the individual property variable you selected. (Note that ‘==’, ‘>’, or ‘<’ can only be used for numeric and timestamp variables.)

options.displayText: is one of the following options (categorical option, e.g. sex (m, f))

settings.name: Selection Value
settings.description: Insert a value(s) for the attribute you have selected (categorical values must be comma-separated!). If you enter a timestamp, please ensure it is in UTC and follows the format ‘YYYY-mm-dd HH:MM:SS’.

settings.name: Time variable?
settings.description: Please check this box if your selected attribute is a timestamp. Please make sure that the timestamp is in UTC and follows the format 'YYYY-mm-dd HH:MM:SS'.
